mapper.sql: service_order_id, order_no, customer_id, service_type_id, store_id, order_status, car_no, car_model, order_amount, create_time, dml_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hqls_service_order ( order_no, customer_id, service_type_id, store_id, order_status, car_no, car_model, order_amount,expect_arrive_time, create_time, dml_time ) VALUES ( #{orderNo}, #{customerId}, #{serviceTypeId}, #{storeId}, 1, #{carNo}, #{carModel}, #{orderAmount},#{expectArriveTime}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE hqls_service_order SET order_no = #{orderNo}, customer_id = #{customerId}, service_type_id = #{serviceTypeId}, store_id = #{storeId}, order_status = #{orderStatus}, car_no = #{carNo}, car_model = #{carModel}, order_amount = #{orderAmount}, create_time = #{createTime}, dml_time = #{dmlTime} WHERE service_order_id = #{serviceOrderId}
mapper.select: SELECT hso.service_order_id, hso.order_no, hc.customer_name, hc.mobile as customerMobile, hst.service_type_name as serviceType, hso.order_status, hso.car_no, hso.car_model, hso.order_amount, hso.expect_arrive_time FROM hqls_service_order hso LEFT JOIN hqls_customer hc ON hso.customer_id = hc.customer_id LEFT JOIN hqls_service_type hst ON hso.service_type_id = hst.service_type_id WHERE hso.order_status = #{orderStatus} AND hso.store_id = #{storeId}
